original_text: And this was the cause that he lifted up his hand against the king: Solomon built Millo, and repaired the breaches of the city of David his father.
korean_text: 그가 손을 들어 왕을 대적하는 까닭은 이러하니라 솔로몬이 밀로를 건축하고 그의 아버지 다윗의 성읍이 무너진 것을 수축하였는데

sentences.original_text: that he lifted up his hand against the king:
and repaired the breaches of the city of David his father.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아비 다윗 성의 무너진 곳을 수리하였더라.
